text: Lost in America is a 1985 road comedy movie starring Albert Brooks (who also directs the film), Julie Hagerty, Maggie Roswell and Garry Marshall. It was directed by Warner Bros. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Albert Brooks Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Lost in America
